com.ninchat.master.gson

Class GsonActionSigning

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ninchat.master.gson.GsonActionSigning

  • public class GsonActionSigning
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for creating action signatures. The methods return values for the master_sign parameters found in Ninchat API. The signatures may be used once before the expiration time. Expiration time is specified in Unix time (seconds since 1970-01-01 UTC), and may not be more than one week in the future. Example (Java 8): 
     
     import java.util.Base64;
     import com.ninchat.master.SigningKey;
     import com.ninchat.master.gson.GsonActionSigning;

     // do once:

     SigningKey key = new SigningKey(
             masterKeyId,
             Base64.getDecoder().decode(masterKeySecret),
             (byte[] x) -> Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(x));

     // do repeatedly:

     long expire = System.currentTimeMillis() / 1000 + sessionExpireTimeout;

     String masterSign = GsonActionSigning.signJoinChannel(key, expire, theChannelId);
    See Also:
    org.apache.commons.codec.binary.Base64

    • Method Detail

      • signCreateSession

        public static java.lang.String signCreateSession(SigningKey key,
                                                 long expire)
                                          throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                                 java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                 java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Generate a signature for use with a create_session API call, when creating a new user. The created user will become a puppet of the master.
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

      • signCreateSessionForUser

        public static java.lang.String signCreateSessionForUser(SigningKey key,
                                                        long expire,
                                                        java.lang.String userId)
                                                 throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                                        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Generate a signature for use with a create_session API call, when authenticating an existing user. The user must be a puppet of the master.
        Parameters:
        userId - must be repeated in the API call.
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

      • signJoinChannel

        public static java.lang.String signJoinChannel(SigningKey key,
                                               long expire,
                                               java.lang.String channelId)
                                        throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                               java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                               java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Generate a signature for use with a join_channel API call. The master must own the channel.
        Parameters:
        channelId - must be repeated in the API call.
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

      • signJoinChannel

        public static java.lang.String signJoinChannel(SigningKey key,
                                               long expire,
                                               java.lang.String channelId,
                                               com.google.gson.JsonElement memberAttrs)
                                        throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                               java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                               java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Generate a signature for use with a join_channel API call. The master must own the channel.
        Parameters:
        channelId - must be repeated in the API call.
        memberAttrs - is an array of key-value pairs (arrays with two elements). It must already have been sorted by the key (the first element of the pair). It must be repeated in the API call (as an object instead of an array).
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

      • signJoinChannelForUser

        public static java.lang.String signJoinChannelForUser(SigningKey key,
                                                      long expire,
                                                      java.lang.String channelId,
                                                      java.lang.String userId)
                                               throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                                      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                      java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Generate a signature for use with a join_channel API call, by the specified user only. The master must own the channel. (Note that the userId is not repeated in the API call.)
        Parameters:
        channelId - must be repeated in the API call.
        userId - is NOT repeated in the API call (it is deduced from the session or authentication credentials).
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

      • signJoinChannelForUser

        public static java.lang.String signJoinChannelForUser(SigningKey key,
                                                      long expire,
                                                      java.lang.String channelId,
                                                      java.lang.String userId,
                                                      com.google.gson.JsonElement memberAttrs)
                                               throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                                      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                      java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Generate a signature for use with a join_channel API call, by the specified user only. The master must own the channel.
        Parameters:
        channelId - must be repeated in the API call.
        userId - is NOT repeated in the API call (it is deduced from the session or authentication credentials).
        memberAttrs - is an array of key-value pairs (arrays with two elements). It must already have been sorted by the key (the first element of the pair). It must be repeated in the API call (as an object instead of an array).
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
